context_bundle.summary: Power Fx is alternative formula syntax for PAD (GA Nov 2024 v2.50). Excel-like expressions vs Robin %var% syntax. NOT Windows Pro only - available to all. Toggle at flow creation. IntelliSense, design-time validation, functional programming style. Robin still fully supported - no migration required

onboarding.quick_start: Create new flow -> toggle 'Power Fx enabled' ON before adding actions. Excel-like formula syntax replaces Robin %var% interpolation. Available to ALL PAD users (not Pro-only), GA since Nov 2024 v2.50
common_patterns: Robin: Set variable MyVar to 'value' | Power Fx: Set(MyVar, "value")
Robin: %Variable% interpolation | Power Fx: Variable direct reference
Robin: If %X% = 'Y' Then | Power Fx: If(X = "Y", ...)
Robin: For each CurrentItem in %List% | Power Fx: ForAll(List, ...)
Power Fx functions: Text(), Value(), DateAdd(), Filter(), Sort(), Concat()
known_errors: Power Fx flows require explicit enable when creating new flow
Not all Robin actions have Power Fx equivalents yet
Can't mix Robin and Power Fx in same flow
Power Fx syntax errors show at design time vs Robin at runtime
IntelliSense/autocomplete only in Power Fx mode
